verses.verse: הַצַּדִּ֣יק <S%H6662><s%> The righteous אָבָ֔ד <S%H6><s%> perisheth וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> and no אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> and no man שָׂ֣ם <S%H7760><s%> layeth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and לֵ֑ב <S%H3820><s%> [it] to heart וְאַנְשֵׁי־ <S%H376><s%> men חֶ֤סֶד <S%H2617><s%> and merciful נֶֽאֱסָפִים֙ <S%H622><s%> [are] taken away בְּאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> no מֵבִ֔ין <S%H995><s%> none considering כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for מִפְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> from הָרָעָ֖ה <S%H7451><s%> the evil נֶאֱסַ֥ף <S%H622><s%> is taken away הַצַּדִּֽיק׃ <S%H6662><s%> that the righteous

יָב֣וֹא <S%H935><s%> He shall enter שָׁל֔וֹם <S%H7965><s%> into peace יָנ֖וּחוּ <S%H5117><s%> they shall rest עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in מִשְׁכְּבוֹתָ֑ם <S%H4904><s%> in their beds הֹלֵ֖ךְ <S%H1980><s%> [each one] walking נְכֹחֽוֹ׃ <S%H5228><s%> [in] his uprightness

וְאַתֶּ֥ם <S%H859><s%> you קִרְבוּ־ <S%H7126><s%> But draw near הֵ֖נָּה <S%H2008><s%> here בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> hither ye sons עֹנְנָ֑ה <S%H6049><s%> of the sorceress זֶ֥רַע <S%H2233><s%> the seed מְנָאֵ֖ף <S%H5003><s%> of the adulterer וַתִּזְנֶֽה׃ <S%H2181><s%> and the whore

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> Against מִי֙ <S%H4310><s%> whom תִּתְעַנָּ֔גוּ <S%H6026><s%> Against whom do ye sport עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> Against מִ֛י <S%H4310><s%> whom תַּרְחִ֥יבוּ <S%H7337><s%> yourselves? against whom make ye a wide פֶ֖ה <S%H6310><s%> mouth תַּאֲרִ֣יכוּ <S%H748><s%> [and] draw out לָשׁ֑וֹן <S%H3956><s%> babbler הֲלֽוֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not אַתֶּ֥ם <S%H859><s%> you יִלְדֵי־ <S%H3206><s%> boy פֶ֖שַׁע <S%H6588><s%> of transgression זֶ֥רַע <S%H2233><s%> a seed שָֽׁקֶר׃ <S%H8267><s%> of falsehood

הַנֵּֽחָמִים֙ <S%H2552><s%> Enflaming בָּֽאֵלִ֔ים <S%H410><s%> yourselves with idols תַּ֖חַת <S%H8478><s%> Under כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every עֵ֣ץ <S%H6086><s%> tree רַעֲנָ֑ן <S%H7488><s%> under every green שֹׁחֲטֵ֤י <S%H7819><s%> slaying הַיְלָדִים֙ <S%H3206><s%> the children בַּנְּחָלִ֔ים <S%H5158><s%> in the valleys תַּ֖חַת <S%H8478><s%> Under סְעִפֵ֥י <S%H5585><s%> under the clifts הַסְּלָעִֽים׃ <S%H5553><s%> rock

בְּחַלְּקֵי־ <S%H2511><s%> Among the smooth נַ֣חַל <S%H5158><s%> [stones] of the stream חֶלְקֵ֔ךְ <S%H2506><s%> [is] thy portion הֵ֥ם <S%H1992><s%> like הֵ֖ם <S%H1992><s%> they גּוֹרָלֵ֑ךְ <S%H1486><s%> they they [are] thy lot גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> Even לָהֶ֞ם <S%H1992><s%> you שָׁפַ֥כְתְּ <S%H8210><s%> even to them hast thou poured נֶ֙סֶךְ֙ <S%H5262><s%> a drink offering הֶעֱלִ֣ית <S%H5927><s%> thou hast offered מִנְחָ֔ה <S%H4503><s%> a meat offering הַ֥עַל <S%H5921><s%> concerning אֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these אֶנָּחֵֽם׃ <S%H5162><s%> Should I receive comfort

עַ֤ל <S%H5921><s%> and הַר־ <S%H2022><s%> mountain גָּבֹ֙הַּ֙ <S%H1364><s%> Upon a lofty וְנִשָּׂ֔א <S%H5375><s%> and high שַׂ֖מְתְּ <S%H7760><s%> hast thou set מִשְׁכָּבֵ֑ךְ <S%H4904><s%> thy bed גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> also שָׁ֥ם <S%H8033><s%> there עָלִ֖ית <S%H5927><s%> even thither wentest thou up לִזְבֹּ֥חַ <S%H2076><s%> to offer זָֽבַח׃ <S%H2077><s%> sacrifice

וְאַחַ֤ר <S%H310><s%> Behind הַדֶּ֙לֶת֙ <S%H1817><s%> the doors וְהַמְּזוּזָ֔ה <S%H4201><s%> also and the posts שַׂ֖מְתְּ <S%H7760><s%> hast thou set up זִכְרוֹנֵ֑ךְ <S%H2146><s%> thy remembrance כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> Indeed מֵאִתִּ֞י <S%H853><s%> גִּלִּ֣ית <S%H1540><s%> for thou hast discovered וַֽתַּעֲלִ֗י <S%H5927><s%> [thyself to another] than me and art gone up הִרְחַ֤בְתְּ <S%H7337><s%> thou hast enlarged מִשְׁכָּבֵךְ֙ <S%H4904><s%> thy bed וַתִּכְרָת־ <S%H3772><s%> and made לָ֣ךְ מֵהֶ֔ם <S%H1992><s%> You אָהַ֥בְתְּ <S%H157><s%> thee [a covenant] with them thou lovedst מִשְׁכָּבָ֖ם <S%H4904><s%> their bed יָ֥ד <S%H3027><s%> where חָזִֽית׃ <S%H2372><s%> thou sawest

וַתָּשֻׁ֤רִי <S%H7788><s%> And thou wentest לַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> to the king בַּשֶּׁ֔מֶן <S%H8081><s%> with ointment וַתַּרְבִּ֖י <S%H7235><s%> and didst increase רִקֻּחָ֑יִךְ <S%H7547><s%> thy perfumes וַתְּשַׁלְּחִ֤י <S%H7971><s%> and didst send צִרַ֙יִךְ֙ <S%H6735><s%> thy messengers עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> A great מֵ֣רָחֹ֔ק <S%H7350><s%> far off וַתַּשְׁפִּ֖ילִי <S%H8213><s%> and didst debase עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against שְׁאֽוֹל׃ <S%H7585><s%> [thyself even] unto hell

בְּרֹ֤ב <S%H7230><s%> in the greatness דַּרְכֵּךְ֙ <S%H1870><s%> of thy way יָגַ֔עַתְּ <S%H3021><s%> Thou art wearied לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> did not אָמַ֖רְתְּ <S%H559><s%> [yet] saidst נוֹאָ֑שׁ <S%H2976><s%> thou not There is no hope חַיַּ֤ת <S%H2416><s%> the life יָדֵךְ֙ <S%H3027><s%> of thine hand מָצָ֔את <S%H4672><s%> thou hast found עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּ֖ן <S%H3651><s%> after that לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> did not חָלִֽית׃ <S%H2470><s%> therefore thou wast not grieved

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִ֞י <S%H4310><s%> of whom דָּאַ֤גְתְּ <S%H1672><s%> And of whom hast thou been afraid וַתִּֽירְאִי֙ <S%H3372><s%> or feared כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> When תְכַזֵּ֔בִי <S%H3576><s%> that thou hast lied וְאוֹתִי֙ <S%H853><s%> לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> Nor זָכַ֔רְתְּ <S%H2142><s%> and hast not remembered לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor שַׂ֖מְתְּ <S%H7760><s%> me nor laid עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and לִבֵּ֑ךְ <S%H3820><s%> care for הֲלֹ֨א <S%H3808><s%> Nor אֲנִ֤י <S%H589><s%> I מַחְשֶׁה֙ <S%H2814><s%> hold peace וּמֵ֣עֹלָ֔ם <S%H5769><s%> even of old וְאוֹתִ֖י <S%H853><s%> לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> Nor תִירָֽאִי׃ <S%H3372><s%> and thou fearest

אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I אַגִּ֖יד <S%H5046><s%> I will declare צִדְקָתֵ֑ךְ <S%H6666><s%> thy righteousness וְאֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> מַעֲשַׂ֖יִךְ <S%H4639><s%> and thy works וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> they will not יוֹעִילֽוּךְ׃ <S%H3276><s%> for they shall not profit

בְּזַֽעֲקֵךְ֙ <S%H2199><s%> When thou criest יַצִּילֻ֣ךְ <S%H5337><s%> deliver קִבּוּצַ֔יִךְ <S%H6899><s%> let thy companies וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כֻּלָּ֥ם <S%H3605><s%> all יִשָּׂא־ <S%H5375><s%> shall carry them all away ר֖וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> thee but the wind יִקַּח־ <S%H3947><s%> shall take הָ֑בֶל <S%H1892><s%> vanity וְהַחוֹסֶ֥ה <S%H2620><s%> [them] but he that putteth his trust בִי֙ יִנְחַל־ <S%H5157><s%> in me shall possess אֶ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land וְיִירַ֖שׁ <S%H3423><s%> and shall inherit הַר־ <S%H2022><s%> mountain קָדְשִֽׁי׃ <S%H6944><s%> my holy

וְאָמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> And shall say סֹֽלּוּ־ <S%H5549><s%> Cast ye up סֹ֖לּוּ <S%H5549><s%> cast ye up פַּנּוּ־ <S%H6437><s%> prepare דָ֑רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> the way הָרִ֥ימוּ <S%H7311><s%> take up מִכְשׁ֖וֹל <S%H4383><s%> the stumblingblock מִדֶּ֥רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> out of the way עַמִּֽי׃ <S%H5971><s%> of my people ס

כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> For כֹ֨ה <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַ֜ר <S%H559><s%> For thus saith רָ֣ם <S%H7311><s%> the high וְנִשָּׂ֗א <S%H5375><s%> and lofty One שֹׁכֵ֥ן <S%H7931><s%> that inhabiteth עַד֙ <S%H5703><s%> eternity וְקָד֣וֹשׁ <S%H6918><s%> [is] Holy שְׁמ֔וֹ <S%H8034><s%> whose name מָר֥וֹם <S%H4791><s%> in the high וְקָד֖וֹשׁ <S%H6918><s%> and holy אֶשְׁכּ֑וֹן <S%H7931><s%> I dwell וְאֶת־ <S%H854><s%> and with דַּכָּא֙ <S%H1793><s%> [place] with him also [that is] of a contrite וּשְׁפַל־ <S%H8217><s%> and humble ר֔וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> spirit לְהַחֲיוֹת֙ <S%H2421><s%> to revive ר֣וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> the spirit שְׁפָלִ֔ים <S%H8217><s%> of the humble וּֽלְהַחֲי֖וֹת <S%H2421><s%> and to revive לֵ֥ב <S%H3820><s%> the heart נִדְכָּאִֽים׃ <S%H1792><s%> of the contrite ones

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> Nor לְעוֹלָם֙ <S%H5769><s%> for ever אָרִ֔יב <S%H7378><s%> For I will not contend וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> Nor לָנֶ֖צַח <S%H5331><s%> neither will I be always אֶקְּצ֑וֹף <S%H7107><s%> wroth כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> For ר֙וּחַ֙ <S%H7307><s%> for the spirit מִלְּפָנַ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before יַֽעֲט֔וֹף <S%H5848><s%> should fail וּנְשָׁמ֖וֹת <S%H5397><s%> me and the souls אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I עָשִֽׂיתִי׃ <S%H6213><s%> [which] I have made

בַּעֲוֹ֥ן <S%H5771><s%> For the iniquity בִּצְע֛וֹ <S%H1215><s%> of his covetousness קָצַ֥פְתִּי <S%H7107><s%> was I wroth וְאַכֵּ֖הוּ <S%H5221><s%> and smote הַסְתֵּ֣ר <S%H5641><s%> him I hid וְאֶקְצֹ֑ף <S%H7107><s%> me and was wroth וַיֵּ֥לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> went שׁוֹבָ֖ב <S%H7726><s%> frowardly בְּדֶ֥רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> in the way לִבּֽוֹ׃ <S%H3820><s%> of his heart

דְּרָכָ֥יו <S%H1870><s%> his ways רָאִ֖יתִי <S%H7200><s%> I have seen וְאֶרְפָּאֵ֑הוּ <S%H7495><s%> and will heal וְאַנְחֵ֕הוּ <S%H5148><s%> him I will lead וַאֲשַׁלֵּ֧ם <S%H7999><s%> him also and restore נִֽחֻמִ֛ים <S%H5150><s%> comforts ל֖וֹ וְלַאֲבֵלָֽיו׃ <S%H57><s%> unto him and to his mourners

בּוֹרֵ֖א <S%H1254><s%> I create [נוּב כ] (נִ֣יב <S%H5108><s%> fruit ק) שְׂפָתָ֑יִם <S%H8193><s%> of the lips שָׁל֨וֹם ׀ <S%H7965><s%> Peace שָׁל֜וֹם <S%H7965><s%> peace לָרָח֧וֹק <S%H7350><s%> to [him that is] far off וְלַקָּר֛וֹב <S%H7138><s%> and to [him that is] near אָמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> saith יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וּרְפָאתִֽיו׃ <S%H7495><s%> and I will heal

וְהָרְשָׁעִ֖ים <S%H7563><s%> But the wicked כַּיָּ֣ם <S%H3220><s%> sea נִגְרָ֑שׁ <S%H1644><s%> [are] like the troubled כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for הַשְׁקֵט֙ <S%H8252><s%> rest לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not יוּכָ֔ל <S%H3201><s%> when it cannot וַיִּגְרְשׁ֥וּ <S%H1644><s%> cast up מֵימָ֖יו <S%H4325><s%> whose waters רֶ֥פֶשׁ <S%H7516><s%> mire וָטִֽיט׃ <S%H2916><s%> and dirt
אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> There שָׁל֔וֹם <S%H7965><s%> [There is] no peace אָמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> saith אֱלֹהַ֖י <S%H430><s%> my God לָרְשָׁעִֽים׃ <S%H7563><s%> to the wicked ס
